Job Description:
* Job Scope:

Sales Supervisor supervises and coordinates the daily activities of sales representatives engaged in promoting and selling a product by phone or mail. Recommends changes to current sales techniques or procedures based on team performance and new selling techniques.

* Job Responsibilities:

• Handle key accounts as assigned by General Manager/Director
• Promote our products and work as teams to proposal quotations or any required information from client
• Build strong network with interior design company, architecture, kitchen builder, contractors etc.
• Follow up on proposals to close sale and secure client decision on project
• Support Project Sales for any reasonable tasks assigned
• Other tasks as assigned by immediate supervisor
Job Requirement:
* Job Requirements

• Minimum two-year of sales management experience and/or relevant, preferably with majority of time spent on commercial or industrial buildings 
• Solid problem-solving skills and the ability to work efficiently and independently
• Excellent interpersonal, verbal and written communication skills
• Outstanding client relationship skills
• Proficient English user both spoken and written
• Knowledgeable in construction field, interior design materials and furniture
Benefits
• Health and accident insurance
• Annual leave and other Leave entitlement
• Meal and other allowances
• Public Holidays
• Annual staff party and other staff gathering events
• Training opportunities
• And other benefits

* How to Apply
* To apply, please submit your CV and Cover Letter to email hr@dh3group.com
* For more information, please contact 086 988 175 / 078 250 049.
Company Profile: DH3 Consultant Co., Ltd. is legal designing company, established in 2007. We have been providing our clients reliable solutions to their most complex interior and exterior designing and construction challenges. DH3 Consultant Co., Ltd also provides its best quality products of furniture for office, shopping center, clubs, and business center, apartment and condominium. Added to these, the company produces and imports kitchen set from well-known brands of Italy, Malaysia, Singapore, and Thailand. Today, DH3 Consultant Co., Ltd. is recognized as a leading company in designing and decorating house, condominium, apartment, office, shopping center and supermarket. Referring to our rapid growth and business expansion, we are currently seeking competitive and dynamic candidates with relevant experiences for following positions based in PHNOM PENH/Site.

job title: Legal Manager , Local and under 2.5 k
position: Legal Manager , Local and under 2.5 k
Job Description:
• Legal Manager is required to handle various legal matters after understanding the client's case. 
• Legal Manager needs to offer advice on managing the tender documents. 
• Legal Manager needs to review the existing legal cases of the organization and work upon resolving them. 
• Legal Manager is involved in hiring members for the legal department after assessing their skills and abilities. 
• Legal Manager is required to train the newly joined staff members on various legal aspects. 
• Legal Manager needs to provide legal advice to the management. 
• Legal Manager is required to analyze the risks while signing new business deals. 
• Legal Manager needs to analyze legal information and do the essential paperwork. 
• Legal Manager is required to handle litigation management. 
• Legal Manager is required to review contracts and agreements and see to it that they comply with the legal norms. 
• Legal Manager is required to deal with external law authorities. 
• Legal Manager needs to review the legal risks involved in various business deals and share the same with the management.

• Graduated from Law major. 
• At least 5 years experience in law. 
• Technical understanding of the Company.'s business and operations and attention to details. 
• Excellent interpersonal communication at all levels (verbal and written). 
• Problem solving and analytical skills. 
• Ability to multi-task and meet deadlines. 
• Ability to cope with high levels of responsibility and with confidential matters. 
• Ability to work well within the team. 
• A high level of professionalism which is required on the job at all times. 
• Computer Literacy.

Job Description:
 Participate in strategic & long-term planning of the 
  Company strategic direct investment projects including 
  land acquisitions, divestments, project finance and 
  mergers and acquisitions.
 Screen, evaluate and execute investment opportunities 
  that comply with the request from Management team, 
  including private equity, and direct or co-investment 
  opportunities.
 Oversee and endorse land valuations using various 
  methodologies including, but not limited to, 
  discounted cash flow, direct comparison (with accurate 
  market comparable) or depreciated replacement cost 
  (when doable), foster valuation process improvements
 Carry out feasibility studies and present 
  recommendations pertaining to potential land 
  developments, collaborate and work closely with the 
  Acquisition Department to present detailed reports and 
  analysis, support draft and presentation of all 
  investment proposals
 Lead market studies and researches pertaining to 
  lands, residential & commercial real estates in areas 
  such as offer, demand, pricing, trends, market 
  constraints & practices
 Design surveys pertaining to direct and indirect 
  competitors’ positioning and strategies
 Compile and archive data, build consulting 
  capabilities serving company’s investment and 
  development projects, monitor actual market forces, 
  new entrants and entry modes
 Understand and proactively detect emerging trends and 
  shifts in local/regional lifestyles
 Evaluate the competitive landscape by preparing 
  benchmarking analysis and evaluation in regards to 
  Cambodia and other neighboring markets in the Great 
  Mekong Sub region
 Contribute to project conceptualization phase, project 
  branding and marketing strategy
Job Requirement:
 Bachelor’s degree or above in Real Estate, Property 
  Development or related fields,
 Minimum 7 years of working experience in property 
  valuation for the purposes, joint venture, bank 
  security, secured lending, tax audit and property 
  development
 Fluent in at least two of the following languages – 
  English, Chinese and Khmer.
 Strong analytical and problem-solving skills as well 
  as critical and logical thinking skills
 Good communication, oral & written, strong analytical, 
  interpersonal & leadership skills
 Understand the local business conditions & complexity 
  of doing valuation in Cambodia

Job Description:
• Implement effective recruitment strategies to attract the best 
  talents.
• Oversee the recruitment process and observe when necessary.
• To ensure that all recruitment is in accordance with plans, 
  agreed policies and budget.
• To maintain a strategic relationship with senior recruiters to 
  ensure they are fully aware of the company and potential 
  recruitment needs and so refer appropriate candidates to the 
  company.
• To maintain and develop annual staffing plans, review and 
  recommend changes including figures for future years.
• Creating and continually improving offer letters and contracts 
  of employment, whilst managing the timely distribution of such 
  documents.
  Overseeing the day to day management of the recruitment process, 
  including reviewing job descriptions, website advertising, 
  updating of the company resource plan, sifting and selection of 
  CV’s, attending interviews and selecting candidates.

2. POLICIES & PROCEDURES 
• Oversee, update and review HR policies as and when appropriate 
  in line with legislative changes.
• Ensure that all employees are well aware of the current and 
  newly updated policies, if any.
• Knowledge and understanding of all the company’s policies in 
  order to provide advice and support to staff and line 
  management.

3. TRAINING & DEVELOPMENT
• Develop and enhance strategies and policies to maximise the 
  skill set of every employee so that they can deliver the 
  objectives of their post in the most effective way for the 
  benefit of the company and our clients.
• Plan and develop the suite of training and development 
  programmes which are appropriate for each type and level of 
  employee and Partner for inclusion within relevant appraisals 
  process. 
• To review the internal and external training and development 
  resources available and offered to all  staff to ensure that 
  they are of the highest standard and meet the specific needs of 
  the learning and development plans.
• Review each year and improve the learning and development 
  offering being included within appraisal forms, the quality of 
  the resources to deliver that offering and to review the agreed 
  learning and development plans arising from the appraisal to 
  understand the developing needs of the departments and sectors 
  as reflected in those agreed learning and development plans. 
• Develop training and communications materials to support 
  learning and development needs.
• Manage the organisation and delivery of company induction 
  sessions, including writing and delivering the presentations

4. PERFORMANCE APPRAISAL
• To ensure that the appraisal process is completed across all 
  departments and review and report to the Management Board on 
  issues, lessons and changes arising from each annual round of 
  appraisals.
• To ensure that all agreed action from appraisals which are 
  within the remit of HR are completed in a timely way, 
  particularly learning and development objectives.

• To participate in appraisals for senior staff and executive 
  staff as required by the Management Board, to ensure company’s 
  policies are followed. 
• To advise on proposals for promotions arising from the appraisal 
  process to ensure that they meet the criteria within company’s 
  recruitment policy.

5. COMPENSATION & BENEFITS
• Payroll administer and ensure that salary is being paid on 
  timely manner.
• Analyse the salary survey when necessary and suggest for changes 
  when needed.
• Manage an organization's compensation and rewards program.
• Develop and evolve an organization's pay scale and structure.
• Determine competitive wage rates and change as necessary.
• Ensure that the company's pay scale complies with changing local 
  laws and regulations.
Job Requirement:
1. Bachelor or Master’s Degree in Human Resource Management or 
   business-related discipline.
2. Experience in developing and implementing HR strategies that 
   align with business goals in the areas of recruitment and 
   retention; people development; employee relations, compliance 
   and HRIS.
3. Experience preferably in a private equity or financial 
   industry.
4. Confident individual with a proactive attitude.
5. Exceptional interpersonal skills, demonstrating professionalism 
   in all dealings.
6. A self-starter, able to demonstrate high levels of initiative 
   and motivation, but also work closely with other team members 
   and displaying trust and loyalty.
7. Ability to manage assigned tasks in an assertive, efficient and 
   timely manner.
8. A good working knowledge of Microsoft Excel and Word, and 
   strong HRIS experience required.

Job Description:
Purposes of the Position

• Manage electrical team in monitoring & controlling power supply to ensure that operation of all Tenants are smoothly operated.
• To counsel technical support, compromise with civil work in order to avoid any effect to all tenants operation and construction and supervise daily operation activities related to technical work in order to provide service to customers regarding to power supply, water supply and waste water treatment process.

Roles and Responsibilities

• Create electrical drawings in AutoCAD to be included in architectural permit package for City submittal/review including power, lighting, and communication.
• Provide engineering and technical support for internal/external construction trades.
• Conceptualize and design energy efficiency programs for implementation across various facilities components such as lighting, motor controls, power systems, etc.
• Confer with engineers, end users, and project controllers to discuss existing or potential engineering projects/products.
• Design electrical instruments, components, and facilities for commercial and industrial applications.
• Direct and coordinate construction, installation, maintenance, documentation, and testing activities to ensure compliance with specifications, codes, and end user requirements.
• Perform detailed calculations to compute and establish construction and installation standards and specifications.
• Inspect completed installations and observe operations to ensure conformance to design
and equipment specifications, as well as safety standards.
• Develop work scopes with project management and end users for material takeoff and job spec.
• Conduct value engineering functions.
• Support estimating and business development.
• Assist in scheduling and coordination of electrical engineering work with project manager.
• Prepare analysis/report for energy savings programs and value engineering.
• Technical problem resolution.
Job Requirement:
Qualifications and Skills Required

• At least qualified and recognized bachelor degree of electrical engineering.
• Minimum 6 years of experience of electrical work or related fields, preferably in Medium voltage power system.
• Ability to design electrical system and qualified knowledge of control system.
• Good self-determination and leadership.
• Qualified ability to use software applications
• Good negotiation and influencing skill
• Good planning and organization skill
• Strong oral and written communication skill
• Ability to work in flexible shift
• Ability to work in team and cross sections and department
• Good writing and speaking in English.

Relationships

Internal: Supervisor of power distribution is required to collaborate with supervisor and staff
in technical section and have good relationship with other staffs of other departments
to ensure smooth and effective operation and provide satisfactory service to customers.
External: Job holder is also required to closely work with concerning contractors, supplier, technical engineers and service provider in PPSEZ.

Job Description:
- Review and provide legal advice on tender documents. 
- Review ongoing cases and advice management accordingly. 
- Liaise with relevant departments to ensure that where legal risks have been identified, appropriate courses of action have been     taken. 
- Provide legal protection and risk management advice to management especially on contract management. 
- Provide and interpret legal information, conduct training and disseminate appropriate legal requirements to staff      Policy development 
- Review and advise management on legal implications of internal policies and procedures. 
- Review and draft contracts, agreements and internal policies and ensure that they are in compliance with all statutory or legal requirements. 
- Review progress of outstanding litigation and liaise with and manage external lawyers.
- Continuously monitor compliance with statutory obligations and advise management accordingly.
- Prepare monthly and quarterly reports for the department for executive management meetings. 
Contract negotiation
- Review all contracts or any other documentation where the Company has committed itself and assess legal implications that need to be brought to the executive management’s attention.
- Prepare, review and modify contractual instruments to assist and support various business activities. 
- Negotiate, review and draft documentation for business transactions and prepare and advise on the necessary checklist to be adopted to ensure information is submitted on time. 
- Liaise with the HR department in conducting performance appraisals and ensure competency Legal advisory and contracts management
- Provide leadership and ensure efficient and effective management of staff and resources in the Legal department.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree of law
- Able to understand and use English as legal skill 
- Strong leadership and managerial skills
- Excellent relationship management and communication skills necessary for interaction with the Demonstrate knowledge of, and experience with, laws dealing with government and/or commercial contract administration, particularly contract negotiation, preparation and administration; 
- Ability to provide independent advice(orally and in writing) to senior level management on highly technical matters; 
- Good planning and organization skills

Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Job Description: Payroll: - Process payroll on a monthly basis for transmittal to payroll service to ensure the salary, benefit and allowance payment to all staff is made on schedule and in line with HR guidelines- Reviews JVs prepared by staff for errors and make any necessary corrections before posting into SUN.- Reviews and check the payroll transfer orders, payroll input of the accounting side.- Verifies cash advance clearance for deducting staff’s salary for the cases over due date - Checks salary related reports to local authorities such as social insurance, health insurance- Reconciles payroll accounts in line with the reporting requirement to ensure all accounts are correctly identified and recorded in SUN for all approved payment vouchers related to payroll payables - Supervises staff in daily payroll transactions- Responds to any staff questions regarding staff related costsFixed Asset:- Plans and prepares for the physical inventory to be streamlined and reduced errors and rework- Conducts the physical count process- Reviews the physical inventory journal entries and reconciliation prepared by team member.Tax: - Reviews PIT reports prepared by staff and posts those transactions in SUN- Prepares CIT reports for the company and ensures timely filling taxes and the taxes are paid keeping in compliance with the local requirements.- Ensures timely reporting and payment of the employer’s and employees’ withholding tax- Critically reviews and analyses tax procedures in order to recommend and implement changes leading to best-practice operations- Updates local financial manual with changes in tax & FA regulations and payroll accounting treatmentMonth End Close / Year-end Audit: - Responsible for month-end close process, included preparing and reviewing journal entries, reconciling accounts and maintaining the integrity of the general ledger system. - Ensures that the majority of month end transactions to be cleaned up - Coordinate the annual audit and manage relationship with the external auditors- Preparation of work papers supporting the annual tax return- Coordinate the preparation of annual tax return with tax consultants
Job Requirement: - Bachelor Degree in Accounting/Finance- 5 years experience with multinational companies- Knowledge of PIT regulation application, VAS - Detail and customer oriented, Team working, Computer Skills (Excel & Sun system)- Direct people management skills and experience- Fluent English speaking and writing. We believe in diversity in our employee population and make sure the employees have proper guidelines for selection and recruitment process."
Company Profile:
Prudential (Cambodia) Life Assurance PLC began operations in Cambodia in January 2013. It is the leading life insurer in Cambodia with more than USD280 million assured and 27,000 policies issued (as at 31 September 2015). One of the first life insurers in Cambodia, Prudential Cambodia is committed to raising the awareness of life insurance among the Cambodian people and helping them protect and secure their financial futures.

Prudential Cambodia is part of UK-based Prudential plc. Founded in 1848, Prudential plc is an international financial services group with significant operations in Asia, the US and the UK. It serves around 25 million insurance customers and have £505 billion of assets under management (as at 30 June 2015). Prudential plc is listed on the stock exchanges in London, Hong Kong, Singapore and New York.

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.
Contact Info: Contact Information PCLA Recruitment HR Manager 087333908 pclarecruitment@prudential.com.kh Phnom Penh Tower, 20F, #445 Monivong Blvd, Boeung Prolit, 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 087333908

Prudential plc is not affiliated in any manner with Prudential Financial, Inc., a company whose principal place of business is in the United States of America.

Job Description:
Location: Phnom Penh / Sihanouk vile International Airport	

RESPONSIBILITIES:
• Install and troubleshoot Walk-through Metal Detector and X-ray screening machines.
• Perform a weekly/monthly preventive maintenance on machines per maintenance schedule.
• Complete technical documentation including service and maintenance reports.
• Fill a maintenance log sheet after completing preventive maintenance on machines on-site.
• Carry out other administrative tasks for the technical department.
• Respond to emergencies and on call demands for servicing and repairs to machines on-site.
• Perform other duties assigned by supervisor.
Job Requirement:
• Cambodian Nationality.
• Diploma/Bachelor degree in Electronics, Mechanism, Electrical and IT fields.
• Proficiency in both speaking and writing in Khmer and English.
• Computer literacy: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Internet and Email etc...
• Able to work in team and independently.
• Honest, polite, friendly and team spirit.
• Strong communication and problem-solving skills.
• Punctuality, hard-working and able to work under pressure.
• Sometimes travel to perform a monthly maintenance on X-ray screening machines in Sihanouk Ville.
• Quick learner.
• Able to work on shift rotation.
• Fresh graduate encouraged to apply.
• Able to attend an overseas training.

Deadline for Applications: 01 September 2021 by 05:00 p.m.

Interested applicants should submit CV and cover letter to: Our representative office at Phnom Penh International Airport National Road No. 4
Or contact through: Daven Yen.Mr (Technical Manager)
Email:daven@primex-inter.com
Phone: 096 600 0075/061 888 366

Only short-listed candidates will be contacted for an interview.
The submitted documents will not be returned.
Company Profile: PRIMEX International Co., Ltd is a leading company in Cambodia that supplies X-ray screening products in Cambodia.  Our partner, Rapiscan OSI Systems company the world’s leading security screening provider is a manufacturing in United State, United Kingdom, Malaysia and Singapore which supplies all securities systems throughout Cambodia. Primex is based in Phnom Penh, Siem Reap and Sihanouk vile.

Job Description:
- Assist with the implementation of key marketing strategies that aim to achieve sales and marketing objectives.
- Supporting role in the brand development program and management of marketing mix.
- Assist in market research and collect market intelligence on the needs and trends of customers.
- Consolidate and submit performance and market intelligence reports on a regular basis.
- Assist in the execution of the commercial projects and assignments to achieve sales and marketing objectives.
- Develop and maintain relationships with internal and external partners.
- Assist in the preparation of public relations projects, involvement in event planning.
- Actively involved in the procurement of services of vendors and suppliers.
- Cultivate an understanding of consumer insights and market trends.
- Complete tasks as assigned from time to time by management as required.
Job Requirement:
- Degree in Business Administration/ Studies, Commerce or Management.
- At least 1 - 3 years of diverse experience in all aspects of marketing and brand building.
- Good command of English, written and spoken; the arithmetic skill required and computer literate.
- Knowledge and understanding of the industry, competitor movements and customers’ value chain.
- Strong project management experience, having worked on cross-functional teams.
- Ability to develop and deliver presentations. Knowledge of advertising and promotional techniques.
- Excellent communication skills, including listening and questioning skills.
- Self-motivated and willing to embrace change, harbors a great passion for his/ her own work.
- Aggressive and takes initiative with strong perseverance.
- Ability to demonstrate energy, sense of urgency, focus and follow-through.
- Honest and with integrity, able to maintain a high degree of professionalism.

job title: ប្រធានការិយាល័យទីផ្សារ
position: ប្រធានការិយាល័យទីផ្សារ
Job Description:
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យទៅលើទំនិញនៅក្នុងស្តុក
-ធ្វើផេនការទីផ្សារចុះផ្សព្វផ្សាយ
-ធ្វើផ្ទាំង​បែននឺផ្សេង និង ផលិតវីដូអូ ខ្លី
-ស្វែងយល់អំពីដៃគូប្រគួតប្រជែង
-ត្រូវរៀបចំយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តទីផ្សារ 
-ត្រូវដឹកនាំក្រុមការងារ
Job Requirement:
- បទពិសោធន៍ការងារពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងការងារបើកបរ យ៉ាងហោចណាស់ ២ ឆ្នាំ
- អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន 
- មានការព្យាយាម ភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ
- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ
- ចេះនិយាយ ចេះសរសេរអក្សរខ្មែរបាន


បែបបទក្នុងការដាក់ពាក្យៈ
- សូមភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនូវ អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ ថតចម្លង សំបុត្រកំណើត   សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ ឬ សៀវភៅស្នាក់នៅ   រូបថត (៤x៦) ចំនួន២ សន្លឹក 
- សូមភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV & Cover Letter)
- លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ពីការពិនិត្យស្វែងរកសារធាតុញៀន 
- លិខិតថ្កោលទោស
- លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ឥរិយាមាយាទពីអាជ្ញាធរមូលដ្ឋាន
- លិខិតបញ្ជាក់សុខភាពពីមន្ទីរពេទ្យ 
- កាតចាក់វ៉ាក់សាំង

job title: អនុប្រធានផ្នែកទីផ្សារ
position: អនុប្រធានផ្នែកទីផ្សារ
Job Description:
-តាមដានទំនិញកម្ម៉ងពីថៃ
-បញ្ជាទិញ និង លក់ទំនិញទៅតាមបណ្ដាសាខា
-ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអតិថិជន
-ត្រូវកត់ត្រានូវទីន្ន័យលក់ផលិផល
-រៀបចំផែនការលក់
-ដឹកនាំបុគ្គលិក
៌-រៀបផែនការយុទ្ទសាស្រ្តទីផ្សារ 
-ដឹកនាំក្រុមទីផ្សារនូវរាល់ដែលមានអីវ៉ាន់ថ្មីៗចូល
-រៀបចំផែនការទីផ្សារអោយមានប្រសិទ្ធភាព
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រ ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ និងការលក់ ឬបញ្ញាប័ត្រដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធនិងការងារខាងលើនេះ
- មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិចបំផុត ១-២ ឆ្នាំពាក់ព័ន្ធ និងការងារខាងលើនេះ
- មានភាពរុសរាយ រាកទាក់ និងម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ចំពោះការបំពេញការងារទៅតាមតួនាទី និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់រាល់ភារកិច្ច និងតួនាទីរបស់ខ្លួន
- ប្រើភាសារអង់គ្លេសបាន និងចេះភាសាថៃ កាន់តែប្រសើរ



បែបបទក្នុងការដាក់ពាក្យៈ
- សូមភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនូវ អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ ថតចម្លង សំបុត្រកំណើត   សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ ឬ សៀវភៅស្នាក់នៅ   រូបថត (៤x៦) ចំនួន២ សន្លឹក 
- សូមភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV & Cover Letter) 
- លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ពីការពិនិត្យស្វែងរកសារធាតុញៀន

Job Requirement:

- មានភាពរុសរាយ រាកទាក់ និងម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ចំពោះការបំពេញការងារទៅតាមតួនាទី និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ

job title: ប្រធានផ្នែកទីផ្សារ និងការលក់
position: ប្រធានផ្នែកទីផ្សារ និងការលក់
Job Description:
-ចូលរួមប្រជុំសូត្រវប្បធម៌ក្រុមហ៊ុនរៀងរាល់ព្រឹកនិងសរសេរផែនការ ការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
-ធ្វើផែនការអនុវត្តន៍ការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃដោយចាត់ទុកការងារណាមានអត្ថិភាពសំខាន់ធ្វើមុន និងឱ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវទាន់ពេលវេលា 
-ផ្សព្វផ្សាយលក់អំពីផលិតផល សេវាកម្ម គោលការណ៍ ផែនការរដ្ឋបាល ដល់ដៃគូសហការ អតិថិជន និងកម្មករនិយោជិត 
-ធ្វើការវិភាគការងារកមិ្រតទំហំនៃការងាររាយការណ៍ជូនថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ។
-សហការគាំទ្រតាមបណ្តាការិយាល័យនិងផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេសផ្សេងៗដើម្បី ជួយសំរួលឱ្យការងារមានភាពរលូន។
-គ្រប់គ្រងការថែទាំទុកដាក់ទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិបិទបើកទឹក-ភ្លើងរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនប្រកបដោយ ការសន្សំសំចៃ និងមានសណ្ដាប់ធ្នាប់ សុវត្ថិភាព ។
-រួមចំណែកដល់ការធ្វើផែនការនិងការអនុវត្ដន៍នៃការផ្លាស់ប្តូរនៅក្នុងការផ្តល់ សេវាដើម្បីបំពេញតាមតមូ្រវការរបស់អតិថិជន។
-ផ្ដល់បឹ្រក្សាដល់ថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំទៅលើវិធីសាស្រ្ដសមស្របទៅនឹងការ ទទួលស្គាល់នៃការប្រតិបត្តិការងារ 
-ទទួលការងារអនុវត្តតាមផែនការរដ្ឋបាលដែលមានលក្ខណៈចង្អុល បង្ហាញឱ្យប្រតិបត្តិការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ 
-ធ្វើការពិនិត្យចំណាយដោយអនុលោមតាមការសម្រេចចិត្តរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការប្រតិបត្តិ និងប្រធានក្រុមប្រឹក្សាភិបាល។
-បណ្តុះបណ្តាលនិងផ្ទេរជំនាញបច្ចេកទេសការងារជាក់ស្តែង ដែលធ្វើរាល់ថ្ងៃដល់ កម្មករនិយោជិតចាស់និងចូលបម្រើការងារថ្មី ។
-ជួយបុគ្គលិកលក់រាយរួមទាំងអ្នកគិតលុយតាមតំបន់អោយបានច្បាស់លាស់។
-បង្ហាញបុគ្គលិកថ្មីនិងចាស់ផ្តល់ការបណ្តុះការធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម
-អនុវត្តយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តប្រចាំតំបន់តាមកាលវិភាគប្រតិប័ត្រការលក់និងធ្វើតារាងតម្លៃលក់នឹងប្រម៉ូសិនផ្សេងៗទៅអោយក្រុមលក់តាមតំបន់និងធានាថាតម្លៃលក់ស្របតាមគោលការណ៏ត្រឹមត្រូវរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនពន្លឿនដំណោះស្រាយអតិថិជននិងបណ្តឹងតវ៉ាដើម្បីទទួលបានការពេញចិត្តជាអតិបរមា។
-ធានាថាការផ្សព្វផ្សាយមានភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រ ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ និងការលក់ ឬបញ្ញាប័ត្រដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធនិងការងារខាងលើនេះ
- មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិចបំផុត៣-៥ ឆ្នាំពាក់ព័ន្ធ និងការងារខាងលើនេះ
- មានចំណេះដឹង Quick Books, Peachtree and SAP កម្មវិធីគណនេយ្យផ្សេងៗទៀត
- មានភាពរុសរាយ រាកទាក់ និងម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ចំពោះការបំពេញការងារទៅតាមតួនាទី និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងប្តេជ្ញាចិត្តខ្ពស់រាល់ភារកិច្ច និងតួនាទីរបស់ខ្លួន
- ប្រើភាសារអង់គ្លេសបាន និងចេះភាសាថៃ កាន់តែប្រសើរ

អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ទទួលបានៈបាន
- ផ្តល់ជួនប្រាក់បៀវត្សសមរម្យ                                                                      - ផ្តល់ជួនប្រាក់ភាគលាភប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- វាយតម្លៃតំឡើងប្រាក់ខែជាប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- ផ្តល់ជួនប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភផ្សេងៗ
- ផ្តល់ជួនប័ណ្ណសមាជិកបេឡាជាតិ របបសន្ទិសុខសង្គម (ប.ស.ស)                   
- ទទួលការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលជំនាញបន្ថែមមុនពេលចូលបម្រើការងារ                     - មានឱកាសក្លាយផ្លាស់ប្តូរតំឡើងមុខតំណែង 
- ទទួលបានថ្លៃកាតទូរស័ព្ទ ថ្លៃសាំង និងថ្លៃទំនាក់ទំនងផ្សេងៗ                                - មានឱកាសក្លាយជាម្ចាស់ភាគហ៊ុន ។ 

បែបបទក្នុងការដាក់ពាក្យៈ
- សូមភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនូវ អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ ថតចម្លង សំបុត្រកំណើត   សៀវភៅគ្រួសារ ឬ សៀវភៅស្នាក់នៅ   រូបថត (៤x៦) ចំនួន២ សន្លឹក 
- សូមភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV & Cover Letter)
- លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ពីការពិនិត្យស្វែងរកសារធាតុញៀន 
- លិខិតថ្កោលទោស
- លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ឥរិយាមាយាទពីអាជ្ញាធរមូលដ្ឋាន
- លិខិតបញ្ជាក់សុខភាពពីមន្ទីរពេទ្យ 
- កាតចាក់វ៉ាក់សាំង

Job Description:
- Responsible for communicating marketing projects, plans, briefs and management of projects.
- Oversee the transition of tasks between teams and ensure smooth operations.
- Manage end-to-end marketing campaign workflow and build efficient processes.
- Manage and produce media plans, forecasts and undertake relevant media research.
- Deliver all aspects of event marketing, research and development programs,
organizing and production.
- Prepare monthly reports and manage forecasting, planning, and marketing budgets.
- Work cross-functionally with the relevant divisions to drive yearly initiatives with the right prioritization based on existing resources and goals.
- Keep management informed of marketing events and ground activities, submit timely activities reports.
- Collect market intelligence on the needs of customers, and the strategy and tactics of its competitors.
- Develop and maintain relationships with external partners, such as Agencies, Vendors
and Suppliers.
- Perform related duties as assigned from time to time as required by the company.
Job Requirement:
- At least 5 - 8 years of diverse experience in all aspects of marketing, planning and analysis, project management and brand building.
- Degree in Business Administration/ Studies, Commerce or Management.
- Ability to maintain performance expectations given limited resources.
- Ability to supervise and guide assigned staff to achieve task objectives, including organizing, prioritizing, and scheduling work assignments.
- Skill in examining and reengineering operations and procedures.
- Ability to demonstrate energy, sense of urgency, focus and follow-through.
- Outstanding organization skills. Able to work on multiple projects and tight deadlines.
- Able to collaborate across different levels of the organization and a proven ability to build and manage relationships.
- Committed to strategic business decision-making; exceptional analytical thought process and business acumen.
- Excellent communicator who can represent the marketing organization in a professional and ethical manner.

Job Description:
- Responsible for media research, forecasting and planning.
- Responsible for media buying and setting objectives, to ensure optimal media space.
- Monitor and audit results of media buying, ensuring in accordance with the agreement.
- Compile and submit financial reports of each media buy for management review.
- Keep management informed of brand media campaigns and competitor’s movements.
- Provide media support for projects encompassing PR, brand campaigns, etc.
- Coordinate with relevant divisions to create opportunistic brand media campaigns.
- Be an important communication bridge between our company and the media.
- Establish long-term influential relationships between our company and media agencies.
- Perform related duties as assigned from time to time as required by the company.
Job Requirement:
- Degree in Business Administration/ Studies or equivalent.
- At least 2 - 5 years of diverse experience in most aspects of media and public relations and brand building.
- Good command of the English language; written and spoken, computer literate.
- Excellent communicator who can handle difficult business situations well.
- Excellent knowledge of the national and regional media platforms.
- Proven ability to build and manage relationships with internal and external partners.
- Quick thinker, intelligent and articulate.
- Able to handle a heavy workload and work under pressure.
- Effective team-builder with high accountability for his/her actions.
- Ability to demonstrate energy and sense of urgency to deliver high-quality results.

Job Description:
 Develop sales opportunity and work relationships with internal and external customers regarding cargo booking operations -Land  freight Logistics, Ship Agency Cargo Booking.
 Ensure reliable customer service delivery and on time performance by providing operational direction, shipping documents and other resources required.
 Responsible to ensure that all shipping cargo staff adheres to the company policies and procedures, upholding safety and security.
 Implement a review and risk assessment process on all SOPs and working practices to identify any unsafe practice areas for quality improvement.
 critical issues through liaison with relevant authorities and internal departments to effectively deal with situations.
 Assume responsibility for accident investigation, reporting and statistical analysis.
Job Requirement:
 Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Logistics or Business fields.
 Minimum 4-6 years of experience in following industry Land/Sea freight Logistics, Ships Agency Cargo Booking.
 Strong and Aggressive sale is a must
 Able to do both BD Sales and Shipping Documentation
 Good negotiation skills, interpersonal skills, and problem solving skills;
 Be friendly, flexible, honest, hard-working, integrity and willing to work as a team.
 Can speak English or Thai is more advantage.
 Benefit: 
 Salary Range: 800$ - 1000$
 Uniform
 Staff Insurance: NSSF

Company Profile: TUBE COFFEE created by 3 Cambodian Shareholders. Tube is inspired by London’s metro system, the underground TUBE, for which its fast speed, reliable quality, and affordability are world-renowned. Naturally, these are the very essence which Tube coffee strives to be. We aim to bring fast, affordable, and quality services to Cambodia just like our underground counterpart, but in a coffee way. As synonymous as the tube is with London, Tube coffee aims to be the same in Cambodia, simply by being a Khmer brand created in Cambodia and made by Cambodians to compete with foreign brands. By using yellow, we hope to present to the world the warmth, freshness, happiness, optimism, and positivity of the Khmer culture. So, hop aboard and enjoy a smooth ride on the Khmer tube.

Job Description:
- Create, record, provide all sound, music, or other audio formats for all assigned projects. 
- Responsible for obtaining all sound effects, music clips, voice-overs, whether recorded or live for a specific production. 
- Operate all sound equipment for live-action recordings, studio recordings, digital projects & activations. 
- Mastering/Mixing/Scoring/Sound Designing audio & creating industry-standard, retail-ready final products with good levels & clean sound.
- Handle internal workflow & direct outside agencies, production partners in a variety of cross-disciplinary executions from concept to completion. 
- Driving production projects & maintaining set standards for the best creative output. 
- Follow instructions & details from supervisor or assigned directors or producers. 
- Set up & test sound equipment before events, broadcasts or recordings to get the maximum optimal sound
- Record, edit & mix audio tracks (instruments, vocals etc.) 
- Enhance the sound quality and add sound effects to a recording. 
- Assist video editors to synchronize video with audio tracks.
- Play backing tracks & special effects during live events.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor's degree/certificate in Digital Media, broadcast production, film.
- 2-4years’ experience with sound production, creating, editing, studio/live recording, dialogue, sound effects, samplings, other sounds formats.
- Proficiency in Audacity, Adobe Premiere, Audition, Pro Tools & Logic.
- Proficiency with Mac OS & Windows. 
- Expertise with the composition of songs, live & in-studio recordings
- Expertise in preparing and operating all on-field recording equipment. (lav mics, sound booms, shotgun mics, etc).
- Experience in operating sound mixers, amplifiers, other sound equipment. 
- Commercial-level experience with and an understanding of the audio drama culture and its requirements (sense of pacing, storytelling, rhythm, etc.)
- Excellent listening skills for audio, demonstrating strong judgment assessing audio quality and content
- Editorial support/guidance on all Post aspects of production, such as sound design, scoring, and creation of impactful storytelling through an audio-only format.

Job Description:

• Determine key business development KPIs.

Participate in price setting of products or services by following the industry statistic/data Business Development Planning.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.

- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
1. Overall management of procurement and contract works. 
2. Managing and supervising all team members under his/ her supervision.  
3. Evaluating RFPs and bids: Procurement strategy includes assisting with creating requests for proposals (RFPs) and the evaluation of bids.
4. Managing resources and defining deadlines: A construction procurement schedule identifies the different items needed to be purchased and the schedule needed to ensure each is available onsite at the right time.
5. Monitoring the building process: Throughout the project’s lifetime, he or she is responsible for managing contracts, change orders, submittals, evaluations and performance.
6. Overall study of RFPs/ RFQ/ ITB, and other related bid documents: details study and analysis of requests for proposals (RFPs), request for quotation (RFQ), invitation to bid (ITB) and the evaluation of bids. 
7. Overall reviewing and editing of bid documents include technical proposal, Financial Proposal, Quotation, etc. 
8. Overall reviewing and edition of request for information (RFI) and follow up with all procured projects to know the status of the project. 
9. Searching/ exploring for new biding projects opportunity. 
10. Manage the source of supply and procure according to the material specifications
11. Establish and maintain potential vender record
12. Carry out inquiries and seal bid activities
13. Handle all clarifications during technical & commercial evaluation stage
14. Prepare and compile Purchase Orders
15. Expedite the suppliers to ensure actual progress is in line with the contractual planning
16. Perform all expediting and logistic activities to meet the project schedule
17. Any other work as instructed by Asst. Managing Director (AMD) or Managing Director (MD)
18. Consult and report the related work done to Managing Director (MD)
Job Requirement:
Education: At least Bachelor’s Degree in civil or construction management or in related fields

Experiences: 5-10   years of experience in Procumbent work and/ or in related fields.

Other requirements: 
1. Good command of procurement/ purchasing work. 
2. Good command of construction law. Good command of construction contract, typically FIDIC.
3. Good command of written & spoken English.
4. Computer literacy in MS office, email, virtual meeting. 
5. Responsible, enthusiastic and careful.
6. Able to work independently and be creative and extremely reliable
7. Able to work under pressure and to meet deadlines
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  010 547 527 / 096 889 3228 pakkahr@gmail.com #14 E0,St CKD01, Phum brokar, Sangkat PreySa, Khan Doungkor ,PP 010 547 527 / 096 889 3228

Job Description:
1. Details study procurement documents for each project.  
2. Preparation of contract documents such as Article of agreement, particular condition, general condition and assembly of supporting documents (Quotation, Proposals, Drawing, specification, Cost estimate, BoQ, Scope work, LoI, offer letter, Minute of Meetings, etc.). 
3. Working and managing the request for information (RFI), Request for Extension of Contract, and follow up with all payment/ contract issue of the and solve the conflict resulting from contracting work.  
4. Review plans, specifications and contracts to ensure the correct equipment, material and subcontractor services are ordered and/or purchased
5. Determine or negotiate contract terms and conditions, award supplier contracts or recommend contract awards
6. Manage paperwork related to contracts
7. Establish delivery schedules, monitor progress, and contact clients and suppliers to resolve problems
8. Work with project managers, architects, engineers, owners and others to make sure project goals are met
9. Any other work as instructed by Procurement Manager (PMM)
10. Consult and report the related work done to Procurement Manager (PMM)
Job Requirement:
Education: At least Bachelor’s Degree in civil engineering or related fields

Experiences: 1-5 years in related fields.

** Other requirements: 
1. Good command of procurement/ purchasing work. 
2. Good command of construction law
3. Good command of construction contract, typically FIDIC 
4. Good command of written & spoken English.
5. Computer literacy in MS office 
6. Responsible, enthusiastic and careful.
7. Able to work independently and be creative and extremely reliable
8. Able to work under pressure and to meet deadlines
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  010 547 527 / 096 889 3228 pakkahr@gmail.com #14 E0,St CKD01, Phum brokar, Sangkat PreySa, Khan Doungkor ,PP 010 547 527 / 096 889 3228

Job Description:
- To assist Marketing Manager in the development of the overall digital marketing strategy.
- To implement digital marketing activities across a broad range of digital marketing Channels.
- To manage and maintain the company’s owned media including websites, mobile app, and email/CRM software.
- To manage the creation of relevant and engaging digital content for publishing onto various digital platforms.
- To manage social media marketing campaigns.
- To conduct research on market trends, brand’s audiences and competitors, and end- to-end consumer journey to drive engagements and conversions.
- To analyze digital marketing analytics reports and share insights with the team to develop optimization plans.
- To stay abreast of emerging digital tools and platforms, digital marketing trends, new technologies, and share insights with the rest of the team.
- To report to Marketing Manager;
Job Requirement:
- Strong knowledge in Digital Marketing.
- At least 1 years’ experience in Marketing.
- Good communication, friendly and welcoming person.
- Ability to change direction in response to a fluctuating work environment.
- Good behavior, Hardworking, Flexible, Honest and Self-motivate.
- Able to work under pressure and good at team work.
- Good in writing/speaking/listening both Khmer and English languages.

** Benefits:
+ Basic salary
+ Allowance
+ Lunch
+ Bonus
+ 18days of annual leave
+ And other benefit

** Working Hour:
- Monday to Friday, 9am to 6pm (1hour lunch break)
- Saturday, 9am to 1pm

job title: បុគ្គលិកថែទាំអាគារ
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: បុគ្គលិកថែទាំអាគារ
Job Description:
• ថែរក្សាសម្ភារបរិក្ខា និងឧបករណ៍ប្រើប្រាស់ទាំងអស់ក្នុងអគារកុំឱ្យមានការខូចខាត និងកុំឱ្យបាត់បង់។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការថែទាំ និងជួសជុលប្រព័ន្ធទឹក ភ្លើង ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ ព្រមទាំងសម្ភារ និងឧបករណ៍ផ្សេងៗក្នុងអគារ ឱ្យមានដំណើរការល្អ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការជួសជុលទាំងអស់ឱ្យមាន គុណភាពល្អ ប្រសិទ្ធភាពខ្ពស់ និងមានសោភ័ណ្ឌភាពស្អាតទទួលយកបាន។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើឧបករណ៍សម្រាប់ជួសជុលដែលនៅក្នុងឃ្លាំងឱ្យមានភាពគង់វង្ស។
• រៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃសៅរ៍ ត្រួតពិនិត្យតាម របង ក្នុងអគារ និងបរិស្ថាន ឱ្យមានសុវត្ថិភាព ។
• សម្រាប់កូនសោរខ្ចីសន្តិសុខដើម្បីជួសជុលនៅតាមអគារ ឫថ្ងៃអាទិត្យយកពីអ្នកស្នាក់នៅសាលា។
• ពេលទំនេរពីការងារ ត្រូវជួយតាមផ្នែកដែលត្រូវការកម្លាំង សម្រាប់ថ្ងៃស្អែក និងបន្ទាន់ខ្លំាងភ្លាមៗ។
• បុគ្គលិកថែទំាអគារតម្រូវ ឱ្យចេះធ្វើច្រើនជំនាញ ទឹក ភ្លើង ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ ឈើ សំណង់ បាញ់ថ្នាំទូទៅ លាបថ្នាំជញ្ជំាង ពិដាន និងការងារផ្សេងៗទៀត។
• សម្រាប់បុគ្គលិកថែទំាអគារ ដែលស្នាក់នៅសាលាមានច្បាប់អ្នកផ្ទះ សម្រាប់ថ្ងៃអាទិត្យ ឫថ្ងៃបុណ្យ។
• មានសិទ្ធទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំ ពីប្រធានគ្រូ ឫចាងហ្វាង ហើយប្រគល់ជូនប្រធានផ្នែក។
• កត់គីឡូទឹក ភ្លើងយុំាមី និងស្មាតម៉ាតរៀងរាល់ចុងខែប្រគល់ជូន លេខាធិការ ។
• ធ្វើការងារជួសជុលសម្ភារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ នៅតាមអគារដែលមានបញ្ហា។
• ឆ្លើយតបទៅប្រធានផ្នែកពេលការងារបញ្ចប់។
• បើកសម្ភារពីឃ្លាំងពេលមានតម្រូវការប្រើប្រាស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យសម្ភារជាងមុនពេលចូលធ្វើ និងកំពុងធ្វើ។
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពការងារជាងពេលធ្វើរួច។
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យមើលសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ និងសោភ័ណ្ឌភាពឱ្យបានស្អាតជានិច្ចនៅក្នុងអគារទាំងមូល និងកត់ត្រារាល់ចំណុចខូចខាតរបាយការណ៍ទៅប្រធានផ្នែក ទុកធ្វើថ្ងៃបន្ទាប់ ឫធ្វើភ្លាមៗជាក់ស្តែង។
• រាល់ការងារជាងខាងក្រៅសាលាធ្វើ១០០ភាគរយនៅតាមអគារត្រូវមានបុគ្គលិកថែទំាអគារ ឫជាងសាលាចំាត្រួតពិនិត្យ ពីដើមរហូតដល់ចប់។
• ស្តាប់ Telegram នៅតាមអគាររៀងៗខ្លួន និងក្រុមដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ដើម្បីទទួលការងារ និងដើម្បីទទួលបានព័ត៌មាន។
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យអគារមុន និងក្រោយ ថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកអំឡុងពេលបុណ្យជាតិធំៗ។
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍លទ្ធផលការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងដាក់របាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែជូនប្រធានផ្នែក។
• ទទួលការងារពីប្រធានផ្នែក ។
Job Requirement:
•	បញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាថ្នាក់ទី១២
•	មានអាយុចាប់ពី ២៥ឆ្នាំ ដល់ ៥០ឆ្នាំ
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍ទាក់ទងការងារ ប្រព័ន្ធអគ្គិសនី ប្រព័ន្ធទឹក ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ ថែទំាគ្រឿងបរិក្ខាយ៉ាងតិច ២ឆ្នាំ
•	អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់
•	មានការព្យាយាម និងភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ
•	មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
- Coordinating with legal team, sales, accounting, construction team, managements, and relevant departments to ensure fast and accurate document processing 
- Ensuring that the company’s hotline phone number is responsive and taken care by sales admin
- Updating and explaining the information and terms in project factsheet, booking form, SPA, and IR
- Providing accurate project information toward internal teams and external agencies
- Maintaining client information and special approved terms to ensure high client’s satisfaction before and after house handover
- Ensuring the client’s requests will be fullfilled correctly before and after house handover
- Training, supporting and checking the internal team and agencies to use CRM system or client registration platform with accurate information
- Ensuring fairness and accuracy of client registration’s information, source of client, booking, SPA, and especially commission allocation to both internal teams and external agencies
- Reporting and coordinating any conflict or complaint or feedback from internal team, agencies and clients.
- Supporting Sales team to accurately fill in booking form and attach sufficient documents for SPA
- Coordinating and preparing booking form, and SPA for internal team’s purchase, and clients from top managements
- Preparing SPA and its attachments
- Using CRM to update the reports including house blocking summary, booking report, sales report, commission reports for internal team and agencies, sales team client’s registration, agency client’s registration, and client’s approved requests
- Directly reporting to Sales Admin Manager
- Handling other tasks assigned by Managements
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in Business Administration, or other Business Degrees
- Proven work experience as a Sales administrator or Sales support agent (Minimum of 1 year)
- Hands on experience with CRM software and MS Office (MS Excel in particular)
- Excellent organizational and multitasking skills
- A team player with high level of dedication
- English literacy level needs to be average and above
- Understanding the sense of deadline
- Highly detail oriented and responsible

** Benefits:
+Basic salary 
+Lunch 
+Bonus
+18days of annual leave 
+And other benefit

- 8hour per day (1hour lunch break), 6days per week (one day off per week)

Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

Job Description:
Key Responsibilities:

Efficient month end process:
•	Implement financial system and procedures to ensure earlier month end and yearend meet deadline (Local and group level)
•	Financial report to be 100% accurate, reliable and complete
•	Report any unusual deviation to CFO 
Implement financial Policy and procedure:
•	100% compliance with internal company policy
•	100% compliance with legal requirement
•	Maintained and updated all standard Operation procedure (SOP)
•	Financial policies and procedures communicated and available to all employee 
Control Financial Information:
•	Current and historic information available within reasonable time
•	General ledger reconciliations reviewed monthly
•	Check monthly balance sheet reconciliations and resolve critical outstanding items
•	All General ledger accounts fully reconciled and outstanding items followed up and cleared
•	Perform regular internal control checks in all departments and ensure compliance to policies and internal controls
•	Evaluate accuracy of cost allocations of all departments, ensure costs are correctly allocated as per chart of accounts
•	Process correcting journals if required
•	Resolve all outstanding internal deviations 
Managed Internal Control:
•	No major out of line items
•	No material internal control weaknesses identified during internal and external audits
•	Advice and assistance provided to managers an all internal control weakness
•	All audit points identified addressed and cleared
•	All internal and external audit weaknesses implemented within 3 weeks for critical issues and 6 weeks for medium and low risk issues.
•	All internal audit recommendations and actions addressed within agreed timeframes
•	All recommendations and corrective actions fully operational
Managed working capital, including cash:
•	100% Compliance to finance policies & procedures for cash management by cashier and petty cash assistant
•	Review daily cash & petty cash report
•	Conduct surprise count & month end count both stock and cash
•	Working Capital management, payment of suppliers according to approved credit system
•	Payments to suppliers should not be made before due date (including AP approvals)
•	Recording, confirming & reconciling inter-company balances, including Sending debit/credit notes 
Manage statutory Requirement:
•	All statutory returns and payments (Co tax returns, provisional tax payments) to be completed and submitted by due dates
Managed year-end process:
•	Compliance to format and guidelines of year-end-packs provided to Finance Dept. from group office
•	Year-end packs accurate and completed as per deadlines
•	All regional accounting records 100% compliant with company policy 
•	No material differences on year end packs 
Quality management/People Development:
•	All development gaps identified per team member 
•	Individual trained and developed as per development plan
•	Enforce FI management routines
•	Accountable for adopting own safety behaviour and report unsafe behaviour /conditions/practice of others
Managed AR/Grant credit:
•	Compliance to company policy and procedures 
•	Assist in determining/reviewing credit limits with relevant securities as per policy 
•	Recommendation as to whether credit to be granted or not
HR Services:
•	Discipline applies as per CBC Policies and procedures
•	All grievances attended to as per CBC policies and procedures
•	All breaches of CBC policies and procedures reported to HR services within 24 hours
Job Requirement:
Requirements:

•	Bachelor Degree in Finance and preferred ACCA, CPA, MBA
•	At least 5 Years experiences in Financial Accounting
•	At least 3 Years experiences in costing, budgeting and reporting
•	English – Fluency in writing, speaking and listening

Job Description: The main role of the Supervisor – Assistant Manager of Administration is to ensure overall smooth administration operations of the Factory .• Oversee Fine Flooring facilities’ operations regularly and ensure that they are being conducted and run smoothly at all time.• Oversee and manage overall administration operations including environment and safety of the plant; Develop strategic plan for office level and organizational level.• Develop administration policies and procedures, and strategies, and oversee the implementation by making use of human resources, materials, including annual performance appraisal in the administration department.• Work collaboratively and effectively with other departments within FFC plant to make sure all administration policies and procedures are being followed.• Manage and provide leadership support as well as supervision and direction to the Administration/HR manager and other administration staff.•  Check and approve on the key performance indicator (KPIs) for administration staffs.• ensure that they reach their KPIs then conduct performance appraisal for the administration.• Develop administration staff capacity through internal or external training.• Coach and mentor administration staff to ensure that they can deliver effective and quality, performance.• Manage overall office operations, negotiating contracts, manage vendor relationships and• oversee the office operating systems.• To develop job description Admin personnel, Security guard, cleaners and gardener and Kitchen to ensure carried out their jobs effectively.• Ensure all office properties are being utilized properly and effectively.• Oversee the network administration, manage phone and internet system etc. and help in the evaluation of the information systems .• Liaise with partner institutions, external agencies, government departments (as point of contact person) and distribute the incoming information to related departments accordingly and timely.• Manage the budget plan of the administration department and oversee its development, review operation price and suggest different cost saving policies.• Provide Weekly monthly and quarterly progress report to the HR/Admin Manager and Managements team.• Control Office Stationaries, Officer Supplies and office equipment stock. • Liaise with external partners, like office vendors, and ensure that he can transfer on time.• Answer employees’ queries about Administration -related issues.• Arrange travel accommodations and process expense forms• Other tasks by Manager.
Job Requirement: 1.Education Background: Bachelor’s Degree2.Experience: At least 3 - 5 years of working experience in the administration field. Language: Khmer, English, (if able to communicate in Mandarin is an advantage). 3.Hard Skill: Computer literate (Microsoft Office and Outlook)4.Soft Skill: Detail-oriented, Communication skill, Interpersonal skill, Problem solving skill, Leadership Confident, self-motivated and work under pressure.5.Good administration and management skills; and excellent supervisory skill.6.Ability to solve complex problem. Ability to think strategically; Ability to think critically.

Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. Job Description:

This is typically a full time role with guaranteed hours, although you may be required to manage operations which are running 24x7 and therefore be available for emergencies outside of normal working hours as well. - Excellent organizational skills

Job Description:
- Formulate loan recovery plans for the whole organization.
- Prepare a contingency plan to prevent and cope with credit risk and other related operational risks to ensure good quality loan portfolios.
- Coordinate the effective recovery of delinquent and written off loans.
- Define legal procedure through consulting with the lawyer or legal department
- Implement an effective and efficient with some procedure/
process that properly addresses in the Credit Manual.
- Manage loan default and written off loans by undertaking daily to monthly analysis and reporting issues/exceptions/
severity to Operations Director and Chief Operations Officer.
- Work with risk management to identify current and potential credit risks and develop suitable mitigation/
prevention strategies.
- Ensure monthly loan recovery work plan (loan default and written off loans) has been firmly implemented by loan recovery officers and mobile loan recovery officer.
- Conduct regularly scheduled field visits as well as surprise visits to ensure credit policies and procedures are properly implemented and followed by field staff.
- Document gaps encountered during surprised/planned visits (i.e. actual vs documented process/procedures) and provide recommendations.
- Ensure staff understands the contingency plan and knows how/when to put it in place.
- Analyze delinquent accounts and prepare report on highest risk accounts including recommendations for resolution.
- Work with staffs to help set personal and professional targets and work towards continuously improving the status quo to achieve those targets.
- Any other duties that may be assigned by the Chief Credit Officer (CCO) from time to time.
Job Requirement:
- Must have a Bachelor’s degree in Management, Finance, Accounting or related field
- Five (5) plus in a credit management function
- Knowledge of financial statements and cash flow analysis, industry/market credit research.
- Strong communication, interpersonal and leadership skills.
- Must have excellent negotiation and problem solving skills.
- Must have strong analytical and problem solving skills.
- Must have strong math skills.
- Must have excellent computer skills (i.e. MS Office).
- Must be fluent (both written and spoken) in the local language, ideally with some level of English.
- Must have good training skills – ability to communicate in a clear and concise manner as well as actively listen to participants concerns, questions and ideas.
- Ability to work under pressure, highly self-motivated and traveling to province
- Demonstrate high level of ethical commitment and trustworthiness;

Job Description:
- Develop customer service and customer relationship guideline, and standards to promote customer value that could lead to customer loyalty and business sustainability.
- Conduct branch evaluation on customer service to identify area for improvement in order to ensure all branches office staff provide the good customer experience in term of physical and emotional experience
- Initiate the scheme to promote and/or motivate the branch level to achieve higher customer service satisfaction.
- Ensure sharing of “best practices” ideas – share with the branches what works best in meeting our customers’ needs and exceeding their expectation;
- Improve time to time on customer service to complete to competitors.
- Ensure customer’s complaints and/or feedbacks are effectively recorded and communicated to the complaint resolution committee and professionally provide response to customers.
- Investigate and solve customer’s problems, which may be complex or long-standing problems that have been passed on by branch teller or involved parties
- Manage queue management and ensure branch will serve customer as per standard service turn-around time.
- Set-up annual and long term strategic and budget plan for Customer services department.
- Submit complaint handling report to NBC
- Effectively manage the customer Complaint through: Receiving Inbound Calls, Direct to staff, Suggestion Box, Email (customer feedback) and Social media
- Ensure all branches provide outstanding and consistent advice and service that will make our customers come back by using 4G Superior Service at all times:
- Grooming Professionally
- Greeting Impressively
- Great Service

- Minimum of 3 years experiences in bank or Microfinance operation
- Minimum of 3 years experiences in a management position especially on customer services and hospitality aspect
- Mature knowledge of bank or Microfinance operations including best practices and standards operating procedures,
- Mature knowledge of Customer services, Customer Experience or Hospitality,
- Excellent computer skill-Word processing, spreadsheet, internet and email
- Excellent written and oral communication skills in both Khmer and English,
- Possess effective training and coaching skills and sense of customer services or customer experience.
- Ability to analyst, write reports and business correspondence,
- Ability to pay strict attention to detail and be thorough in the completion of job duties
- Excellent customer-oriented
- Excellent in problem solving, observation and analysis skills.
- Able to conduct training and coaching

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Oversee daily operations of the Intercon Bookstore.
• Contribute operations information and recommendations to strategic plans and reviews; prepare and complete action plans; implement production, productivity, quality and customer-service standards; resolve problems.
• Develop, implement and review operational policies and procedures.
• Develop and update standard operating procedures (SOP) for Intercon Bookstore.
• Ensure staff follows standard operating procedures for all operational functions.
• Coordinates activities that affect operational decisions and business requirements.
• Analyze data to inform operational decisions or activities.
• Keep track of staffing requirements, hire and train new talent as needed to correspond with specific duties and skill sets.
• Maintain safe and healthy work environment by establishing, following and enforcing standards and procedures; complying with legal regulations.
• Plans, schedules, and reviews workload and manpower to make sure targets are being met on a cost-effective basis.
• Work with the senior managements to determine values and mission, and plan for short and long-term goals.
• Support employee communication with the management team.
• Communicate customer issues with staff and devise ways of improving the customer experience, including resolving problems and complaints.
• Manage work assignment and allocation for staff.
• Prepare budget plan.
• Monitor and control expense according to allotted budget.
• Review daily and monthly sale and Sale return reports.
• Ensure accurate and timely stock counts, carried out according to the operation procedure
• Supervises and coordinates activities of staff concerned with ordering, receiving, storing, inventorying, issuing, and shipping books, uniforms, and supplies in stockroom, or warehouse.
• Plans layout of stockroom, warehouse, and other storage areas, considering turnover, size, weight, and related factors of items stored.
• Reviews records for accuracy of information and compliance with established procedures, and to determine adequacy of stock levels.
• Schedules work for special and periodic inventories.
• Do round and conducts surprise stock count.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor or Master’s Degree in management or related field.
• Minimum of 5 years of professional work experience in the respective ﬁelds.
• Knowledge of product selection, inventory control, and purchasing practices.
• Experience in management, operations, and leadership.
• Excellent organizational, analytical, and problem-solving skills.
• Ability to effectively communicate with all levels of the organization.
• Ability to build consensus and relationships among managers, partners, and employees.

*How to apply:

1. Submit your CV and Cover Letter with a 4x6 Current Photo to our email: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh. Please be noted that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

2. Please always put your email subject as “Application for…………. (Position you applied)’’ and rename as your attached file in your full name, e.g., CV_Name.

Address: #11A, St. 402, Sangkat Tumnup Teuk, Khan Boeung Keng Kang, Phnom Penh,Cambodia.

Tel: (855) 12 797 939 (Mon-Fri, 7:30am to 6:00pm.)

Visit our website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description: Purpose of job: Install, maintain and monitor servers and virtual machines, and support daily operations to ensure that server provisioning, decommissioning and achieving security compliance meet timing expectations.   - Deploy servers based on demand from application or business   teams, and ensure requests are fulfilled on time.- Support and maintain servers after deployment to ensure that   requests and issues are properly responded.- Perform backup and restoration tests to make sure systems are   well protected for data loss cases.- Configure monitoring and then monitor servers’ and   applications’ health to maintain the needed availability and   performance.- Apply system patches and security controls to minimize and   mitigate systems security vulnerability- Configure and support applications and systems owners to have   the right Internet access for server to minimize the risk of   exposing servers to the Internet.- Support application/business team to deploy and publish   web/application on the Internet.- Maintain and track device stock and asset inventory.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor degree in IT or related field - One year of hands-on experience with Linux and/or Windows   operating systems- Experience of working on backup systems, monitoring systems, and   virtualization is ad-vantage - Understand of TCP/IP principles - Knowledge of Virtualization principles;  - General understanding of backup and monitoring systems  - Good in English, both written and spoken- Communication skills, Customer focus
Company Profile:
Smart Axiata Co., Ltd., Cambodia’s leading mobile telecommunications operator, currently serves 8 million subscribers under the ‘Smart’ brand. Smart Axiata is part of Axiata Group Berhad, one of Asia’s largest telecommunications groups.

Smart is at the forefront of mobile technology advancement in Cambodia. Smart was the first network to introduce 4G LTE in 2014, 4G+ in 2016 and 4G+ with HD Voice (VoLTE) in early 2017. In mid-2017, Smart introduced cutting-edge 4.5G, manifesting its data leadership position in Cambodia. Smart also provides 2G, 2.5G, 3G and 3.75G mobile services as well as international roaming across more than 190 countries. Its extensive nationwide network coverage stretches to more than 98% of the Cambodian population.

The company is also rapidly transforming itself into a digital lifestyle brand, having introduced many innovative offerings and lifestyle entertainment value propositions. This includes various international partnerships, with brands as diverse as Universal Music, Apple, Facebook and iflix, as well as digital services including SmartLuy, Smart Insurance, SmartPay, Smart Music and SmartNas. Smart aspires to become Cambodia’s Digital Champion, while playing an active role in socio-economic growth.

The company’s workforce consists of more than 1000 local and foreign experts. Smart is committed to its customers, employees and the people of Cambodia, in delivering its promise of enriching their lives through world-class networks, exceptional digital experiences and through significant corporate social responsibility engagements.
Contact Info: Contact Information Kanhaly  010202136 jobs@smart.com.kh Phnom Penh No464 A, Monivong Blvd, Sangkat Tonlebasac, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh  010202136

Job Description:
To develop and maintenance web service/APIs in order to respond to the requirement of WB Finance. This position requires working closely with Senior Manager, Enterprise Architecture Dev’l in order to achieve the final product as user required.

** DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES
- To manage and monitor system service and make sure service run smoothly.
- To communicate with external support vendors to address any issue.
- To implement the updated versions of software.
- Provide training to support staff related system product and service;
- To define and document system test plans for user acceptance testing and regression testing deliverables;
- To create or update documentation related to the activity performed (design document, maintenance procedure);
- Take ownership of the team performance, lead and develop staff under supervision.
- Troubleshot and resolve any issue related to payment system 
- Provide support to end user and relevant team
- Well understand about SWIFT message and ISO message
- Well understand both local and international payment system (CSS, VISA, Master,…)
- Experience with SWIFT Alliance line of product is necessary
- Research new feature/technology related to SWIFT system and payment system
- To provide support for other project initiatives, when requested by management, to manage and/or participate in these project initiatives in line with the Bank’s strategic plans;
- Develop business case for critical system changes
- Participate in the organization and planning of development resources and schedules
- Keep improving web service/APIs skill to support company growth.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in computer science or in related field
- At least 2+ years of experience in working with the SWIFT network and payment system
- Knowledge in programing language such as deeply understand on java or javascript is compulsory, data interchange technology such as XML and JSON,  PLSQL, SQL query language, communicating between web service/APIs to core banking system and other external system
- Knowledge in database such as Oracle, SQL server
Strong troubleshooting and problem solving skills
- Knowledge in banking or finance is a plus
- Knowledge in core banking system is a plus
- Must be a quick learner, able to conduct independent research, methodical, careful, and very well organized
